card.name: Beneath the Mountains
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to play a {Dwarven} weapon from your discard pile.

card.name: Disquiet of Our People
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to make that Dwarf defender +1 (or defender +2 if you spot an Orc) until the regroup phase.

card.name: Dwarven Bracers
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.name: Endurance of Dwarves
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +1.

card.name: Flurry of Blows
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if bearing 2 hand weapons).

card.name: ·Frór, Gimli's Kinsman
card.text: To play, spot a Dwarf. While skirmishing an Uruk-hai, Fror is strength +3.

card.name: ·Glóin, Friend to Thorin
card.text: For each {Dwarven} tale you can spot, Glóin is strength +1 (limit +4).

card.name: Golden Light on the Land
card.text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. At a site which is not underground, each {Moria} Orc's twilight cost is +2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Great Works Begun There
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Dwarf, you may discard the top 2 cards from your draw deck to take a {Dwarven} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Hand Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Archery: Discard this weapon to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Make Light of Burdens
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf companion and discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to discard either a Shadow condition from a Dwarf or a weather condition.

card.name: ·Realm of Dwarrowdelf
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to make a Dwarf strength +1 (limit +3) and, if underground, damage +1 (limit +3).

card.name: Tidings of Erebor
card.text: Regroup: Spot a Dwarf to draw 3 cards. Any Shadow player may remove {3} to prevent this.

card.name: Till Durin Wakes Again
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf companion moves from an underground site, you may heal that Dwarf.

card.name: What Are We Waiting For?
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to make an opponent draw 2 cards. That player then chooses to either discard 2 Shadow cards from hand or skip his or her next Shadow phase.

card.name: A Blended Race
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Plays to your support area. Each Uruk-hai is strength -2 and loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Dismay Our Enemies
card.text: Response: If an Elf archer wins a skirmish, make an opponent choose a minion to discard. That opponent may remove {3} to prevent this.

card.name: Hosts of the Last Alliance
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Elf companion, the minion archery total is -1. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.name: Release the Angry Flood
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf to wound each Nazgûl once (or twice if at a river).

card.name: Secret Sentinels
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally to discard a condition (or 2 conditions if you spot an Orc).

card.name: ·Erland, Advisor to Brand
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Shadow players may not look at or reveal cards in your hand.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Staff
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. The twilight cost of each {Gandalf} spell is -1. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf twice to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.name: Gandalf's Wisdom
card.text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each possession or artifact played on Gandalf or a character who has the Gandalf signet is -1.

card.name: ·Hugin, Emissary from Laketown
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Hugin to reveal a Free Peoples card from your discard pile and place it beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·Járnsmid, Merchant from Dale
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time you play a shield, armor, helm, or hand weapon, its twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Speak "Friend" and Enter
card.text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Gandalf to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). Draw a card if you play an underground site.

card.name: Staff Asunder
card.text: Spell. Skirmish: Discard a staff Gandalf is bearing and then exert him twice to discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Wielder of the Flame
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to make a companion defender +1 until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove {3} to prevent this.

card.name: Wizard Staff
card.text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.

card.name: You Cannot Pass!
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf bearing a staff to prevent a minion from being fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Blood of Númenor
card.text: To play, exert a {Gondor} companion. Plays to your support area. Each {Sauron} Orc comes into play exhausted. Skip the archery phase. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Flaming Brand
card.text: Bearer must be a Man. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Bearer is strength +2 and damage +1 while skirmishing a Nazgûl.

card.name: Flee in Terror
card.text: Response: If a {Gondor} companion wins a skirmish, discard an exhausted Orc. That minion's owner may remove {3} to prevent this.

card.name: Gondor Will See It Done
card.text: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, exert a {Gondor} companion to prevent that wound.

card.name: Natural Cover
card.text: To play, spot a ranger. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at a forest, the minion archery total is -2.

card.name: No Mere Ranger
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make another companion strength +2 (or +3 if that companion has the Aragorn signet).

card.name: Sentinels of Númenor
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} companion strength +2 (or +4 if in a fierce skirmish).

card.name: ·Shield of Boromir
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. The minion archery total is -1. If bearer is Boromir, each minion skirmishing him does not gain strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Beyond the Height of Men
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to discard an armor possession, helm possession, or shield possession (or all such Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 6 companions).

card.name: Demands of the Sackville-Bagginses
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a {Shire} ally exerts, add {1}.

card.name: Evil Afoot
card.text: Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai and spot X burdens to shuffle X minions from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Goblin Man
card.text: Discard this minion if underground. Shadow: Exert this minion to look at the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: ·Lurtz's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be Lurtz. He is damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.name: No Business of Ours
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} minion. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not look at or reveal cards in any Shadow player's hand.

card.name: Too Much Attention
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot an {Isengard} minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 5 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Uruk Captain
card.text: Damage +1. Shadow: Remove {1} and exert Uruk Captain to play an Uruk-hai from your discard pile.

card.name: Uruk Scout
card.text: Tracker. Damage +1. The roaming penalty for each {Isengard} minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert this minion to cancel that event.

card.name: Wizard Storm
card.text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert an {Isengard} minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. When the fellowship moves from this site, every companion must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: ·Archer Commander
card.text: Archer. Each other {Moria} archer is strength +2.

card.name: ·The Balrog's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.name: ·The Balrog, Durin's Bane
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.

card.name: ·The Balrog, Flame of Udûn
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a {Moria} Orc. Discard The Balrog if not underground. Shadow: Exert The Balrog and remove {2} to play a {Moria} Orc from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Cave Troll's Chain
card.text: Bearer must be Cave Troll of Moria. The Free Peoples player may choose for the archery phase to be skipped. Each time Cave Troll of Moria takes a wound during the archery phase, you may wound an archer companion.

card.name: Dark Fire
card.text: To play, spot The Balrog. Plays on Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, Gandalf must exert.

card.name: Dark Places
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each unique {Moria} minion is strength +1. Shadow: Spot an opponent's site to replace it with your marsh or underground site of the same number.

card.name: Fill With Fear
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot The Balrog, skip the archery phase. Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to discard a ranged weapon.

card.name: Final Cry
card.text: Response: If a skirmish that involved The Balrog bearing Whip of Many Thongs is about to end, wound a companion in that skirmish twice.

card.name: Foul Tentacle
card.text: Tentacle. When you play this minion, you may play a tentacle from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.name: Foul Things
card.text: Shadow: Play a {Moria} minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Goblin Flankers
card.text: When you play this minion, you may add {3} if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn.

card.name: Goblin Pursuer
card.text: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Goblin Reinforcements
card.text: When you play this minion, you may heal a {Moria} minion.

card.name: Goblin Scrabbler
card.text: When you play this minion, you may discard an {Elven} condition. The roaming penalty for each {Moria} Orc you play is -1.

card.name: Goblin Spearman
card.text: While bearing a Goblin Spear, this minion is damage +2.

card.name: Huge Tentacle
card.text: Tentacle. Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may play Watcher in the Water from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.name: Moria Archer Troop
card.text: Archer. While you can spot another {Moria} archer, add 1 to the minion archery total.

card.name: Must Do Without Hope
card.text: Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to add a burden.

card.name: Old Differences
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf or Dwarf skirmishing a {Moria} Orc strength -1 (or -3 if you spot an Elf and a Dwarf).

card.name: Power and Terror
card.text: Shadow: Reveal any number of {Moria} Orcs from your hand to play The Balrog. Its twilight cost is -2 for each Orc revealed.

card.name: Throw Yourself in Next Time
card.text: To play, spot a {Moria} Orc. Plays on a Hobbit companion. Bearer may be exerted only by Shadow cards.

card.name: Troubled Mountains
card.text: Shadow: Exert a {Moria} minion and spot X burdens to add {X} (limit {5}).

card.name: ·Watcher in the Water, Keeper of Westgate
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot Watcher in the Water, discard all other minions (except tentacles). Each tentacle is strength +2 and damage +1. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.name: ·Whip of Many Thongs
card.text: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Bill Ferny, Swarthy Sneering Fellow
card.text: Nazgûl are not roaming. The Free Peoples player may not assign a character to skirmish Bill Ferny. Discard Bill Ferny if underground.

card.name: Helpless
card.text: To play, spot Frodo and a Nazgûl. Plays on Sam. Sam's game text does not apply.

card.name: His Terrible Servants
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If a twilight Nazgûl is about to take a wound, remove {1} to prevent that wound.

card.name: It Wants to be Found
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a twilight Nazgûl to add a burden.

card.name: Resistance Becomes Unbearable
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a twilight Nazgûl to exert the Ring-bearer. If the Ring-bearer is then exhausted, he puts on The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: Stricken Dumb
card.text: Maneuver: Exert The Witch-king to discard a tale or weapon.

card.name: They Will Find the Ring
card.text: Maneuver: Exert 2 Nazgûl and spot X burdens to exert X companions.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, The Easterling
card.text: Twilight. When you play Úlairë Attëa, you may wound an ally.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Ringwraith in Twilight
card.text: Twilight. Each time Úlairë Enquëa wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer once (or twice if you spot 5 burdens).

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Ringwraith in Twilight
card.text: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Úlairë Nelya is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Lord of the Nazgûl
card.text: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.name: Wraith-world
card.text: Skirmish: Spot a twilight Nazgûl and the Ring-bearer wearing The One Ring to add 3 burdens.

card.name: The Eye of Sauron
card.text: Shadow: Exert a {Sauron} Orc and spot X burdens to draw X cards (limit 5).

card.name: Memory of Many Things
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a {Sauron} Orc to discard an ally (or 2 {Elven} allies).

card.name: Orc Scout
card.text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each {Sauron} minion you play is -1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character it is skirmishing.

card.name: Orc Taskmaster
card.text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add {1}.

card.name: Southern Spies
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot a {Sauron} minion to make the Free Peoples player discard his or her hand.

card.name: Spies of Mordor
card.text: Search. To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card (or 2 cards if you spot a {Sauron} tracker).

card.name: ·Tower Assassin
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Tower Assassin to wound an ally.

card.name: Verily I Come
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays on the Ring-bearer. Each time the Free Peoples player draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the fellowship phase, add a burden.

card.name: Vile Blade
card.text: Bearer must be a {Sauron} Orc. Bearer is strength +2 while skirmishing a Man or Elf.

card.name: ·Bilbo Baggins, Well-spoken Gentlehobbit
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo and discard a tale to discard a Shadow condition from an opponent's support area.

card.name: Consorting With Wizards
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be Bilbo. Bilbo may not take wounds (except during the archery phase). Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Bilbo or discard this condition to remove {1}.

card.name: Dear Friends
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a companion to place a Free Peoples card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck (or 2 Free Peoples cards if that companion has the Frodo signet).

card.name: Deft in Their Movements
card.text: Stealth. Regroup: Spot 2 Hobbits to make each site's Shadow number -2 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Fearing the Worst
card.text: Stealth. To play, exert 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each search card and each tracker is +2.

card.name: ·Filibert Bolger, Wily Rascal
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit companion twice to cancel a fierce skirmish involving that Hobbit.

card.name: ·Frodo, Reluctant Adventurer
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). The cost of each artifact, possession, and {Shire} tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.name: Hobbit Sword-play
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Hobbit bearing a weapon to wound a minion. That minion's owner may remove {3} to prevent this.

card.name: ·Merry, Horticulturalist
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Merry to play Farmer Maggot from your draw deck.

card.name: ·Mithril-coat
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. The minion archery total is -1. Each minion skirmishing Frodo does not gain strength bonuses from weapons and loses all damage bonuses.

card.name: Nice Imitation
card.text: Stealth. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.name: Not Feared in Sunlight
card.text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. Each Nazgûl is strength -4. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: ·O Elbereth! Gilthoniel!
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be the Ringbearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to take off The One Ring or to cancel a skirmish involving the Ring-bearer and a Nazgûl.

card.name: Orc-bane
card.text: Maneuver: Spot Sting or Glamdring and exert its bearer X times to wound X Orcs or X Uruk-hai.

card.name: ·Pippin, Mr. Took
card.text: Fellowship: Play Gandalf or Aragorn; his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Practically Everyone Was Invited
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.

card.name: A Promise
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.

card.name: ·Red Book of Westmarch
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a tale, you may spot Bilbo to draw a card.

card.name: ·Sam, Proper Poet
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Sam twice to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: Hobbiton Party Field
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Bilbo from your draw deck.

card.name: Hobbiton Woods
card.text: Forest. Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play your site 2 (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Town Center
card.text: Fellowship: Play a {Shire} ally to draw a card.

card.name: Great Chasm
card.text: Underground. The twilight cost of the first {Moria} archer played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.name: Hollin
card.text: Plains. Uruk-hai are not roaming.

card.name: Valley of the Silverlode
card.text: River. Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to Valley of the Silverlode, each Hobbit companion may heal.

card.name: ·Gimli, Dwarf of the Mountain-race
card.text: Damage +1. Each underground site's Shadow number is -2.

card.name: ·Gandalf, The Grey Pilgrim
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, you may draw a card.
